title: Stickman Miners Wars
description: Stickman Miners Wars is a defense game where the bad guys take your kingdom, and as a king, it is your job to get it back! Recruit different armies like warriors, archers, wizards, and miners to help you out. Command them to attack the enemy's towers and castle. Collect gold and mine resources to make your kingdom stronger. Defend your towers and castle from bad guys and take over theirs! Can you save the kingdom?
